Text: This is a fixed and complete version of d0main's Samurai Jack torrent. The corrupted episodes are fixed, and the missing episodes are here.

If you were downloading d0main's torrent, stop.
Erase
Samurai Jack - Episode 45 - The Aku Infection.avi
Samurai Jack - Episode 21 - Jack and the Dragon.avi

and resume your download with this torrent instead.

It took a couple years for me to get every single episode all in one place.
If you want a particular format, re-encode it yourself.

It doesn't bother me at all. I uploaded this to replace an inferior but popular torrent that had some broken and some missing episodes with working ones at higher quality.
The original person who I counter-uploaded was not upset. So neither am I.

The reason only a few episodes are high-quality was so that I could make a torrent that the downloaders from his torrent could use. I told them to delete certain files and then resume their downloading with mine and it worked.

Samurai Jack is an artful, creative, and excellent series; and a rare gem. If you also have a better torrent, then .
